name: Silent Storms
description:
On the rainiest day of the season, the player must trek home through the most violent storm of the season.  The only problem is that they don't have an umbrella to brave the storm with! During a short stop at a convenience store, you must choose between between 2  different colored umbrellas and deal with two customers who are VERY particular about getting their favorite color.

CREATOR'S NOTE:

It's a very short, unpolished game but I hope people can find a little bit of enjoyment in it! This is my very first game and is apart of My First Game Jam 2018! 

Let me know if you find any bugss/errors. I'm excited to improve!!

CREDITS:

-Music is from VFR

-Rain and thunder sound effects acquired via Soundbible

-Etc. sfx created by myself!
